name: Basically FNF
description:
Warning:Itch Io Removes the Scratch bar even though it is added in this build, DO NOT UNFOCUS THE GAME OR YOU WILL HAVE TO REFRESH THE PAGE, THIS IS A TURBOWARP PROBLEM

Basically FNF is as it says by the name BASICALLY is Friday night funkin'

There are alot of glitches. Week 2 will glitch the menus

and on newgrounds only from what i can tell Sometimes inputs break and require a refresh,

NOTE: NONE OF THE MAPS ARE CORRECT THEY ARE ALL TEST MAPS

Controls:

Arrows - Hits the arrows

B - Backs out of menus

Enter - Goes into Menus

Credits:

--Music and Sounds--

Gettin' Freaky - Friday night Funkin'

Air Time - MrLog (Scratch Username)

Intro - I don't know i think something by sega? it sounds segaesk

Clear - Super Mario 3D World Finish level theme

Sound effects from FNF

Orignal FNF Team

Ninjamuffin99

Phantom Arcade

evilsk8r

Kawai Sprite

Without them this project would of never existed, And I thank them all

If you want Basically FNF taken down (Even though the read me says stuff like this is fine) Then I'll listen and take down the game

--Art Assets--

Ooferlol (Scratch and Discord username) - Creator of Oofer

Markus Art by Treecko-Trick123 (Scratch Username) Permsion was given to use without credit but i like giving credit anyways He deserves it.

Boyfriend Trace (used for Clyde) By AwezomeXD (Scratch Username)

Sonic:Sonic 2

Most art assets made by me but inspired by FNF's art that the art i made replaces

--Engine--

Game made in scratch Running under TurboWarp with 60FPS Compilation and widescreen Support

Coding by Me

This Project was made for Fun under 3 days, I am just wanting to push scratch's limits. Feel free to use this project for anything you wish as long as it falls under the rules of where ever your posting it too, you can even take this games html and shove it somewhere else and all will be cool.

This games SB3 file will be shared soon enough and will be released on scratch aswell.
